question:
India recently became the first country to completely digitize the Hajj pilgrim process. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The Hajj pilgrimage occurs during the first month of Islamic calendar.
  2. It is the second largest gathering of Muslims in the world.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Hajj is a pilgrimage undertaken by Muslims across the world to Mecca in Saudi Arabia. The journey is undertaken during the last month of the Islamic calendar, called the Dhu al-Hijjah. India recently succeeded in achieving full digitisation of the pilgrimage process. Statement 2 is correct:    It is the second largest gathering of Muslims in the world after the Arba’deen Pilgrimage undertaken to Iraq. It is considered a mandatory duty of Muslims. It is also considered as one of the five pillars of Islam. India introduced a Hajj mobile app, online application process, e-luggage pre- tagging process, etc. to facilitate the pilgrimage from India.
